programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost...
programme.desc: ...Protocol: (2011) Part four of the Tom Cruise action-thriller franchise. The Impossible Missions Force fight to clear their name, while also trying to avert nuclear war. Busy, busy, busy!

programme.title: Team America: World Police
programme.desc: (2004) Outrageous satirical comedy from the South Park team. A crack team of puppets battle to save the world from an evil terrorist plot hatched by North Korean leader Kim Jong Il.

programme.title: Flag Day
programme.desc: (2021) Crime drama based on a true story, directed by and starring Sean Penn as a talented counterfeiter who's not so good as a father. Features Penn's real-life kids Dylan and Hopper Jack.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Buchanan Rides Alone
programme.desc: (1958) Western. Randolph Scott stars as a drifter who arrives in a small border town and tangles with a group of villains after helping a wealthy young Mexican, played by Manuel Rojas.

programme.title: The Frogmen
programme.desc: (1951) Second World War thriller. Richard Widmark, Dana Andrews and Robert Wagner star as divers with a special underwater demolition team taking the war to the Japanese in the Pacific.

programme.title: Fantastic Voyage
programme.desc: (1966) Classic sci-fi adventure. Raquel Welch and Donald Pleasence are among the crew of a miniaturised submarine that's injected into an injured diplomat's body in a bid to save his life.

programme.title: The Black Shield of Falworth
programme.desc: (1954) Medieval action-adventure starring Tony Curtis and Janet Leigh. When a peasant discovers his true lineage, he sets out to woo his noble sweetheart and avenge his father's murder.

programme.title: Lion
programme.desc: (2016) Poignant drama starring Dev Patel and Nicole Kidman. A man who was separated from his family as a child embarks on a journey to find his way back home.

programme.title: LA Confidential
